original_text: At the noise of the stamping of the hoofs of his strong horses, at the rushing of his chariots, and at the rumbling of his wheels, the fathers shall not look back to their children for feebleness of hands;
korean_text: 군마의 발굽 소리와 달리는 병거 바퀴가 진동하는 소리 때문에 아버지의 손맥이 풀려서 자기의 자녀를 돌보지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: At the noise of the stamping of the hoofs of his strong horses,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 강한 말들의 굽을 밟는 소리에,

sentences.original_text: at the rushing of his chariots,
and at the rumbling of his wheels,
the fathers shall not look back to their children
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지들은 자기들의 자식들을 뒤돌아보지 않을 것이니
